parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math - Geometry </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks for object intersection with a virtual line between two positions. Returns true if intersects with an object.

<br><br>'''NOTE:''' Doesn't work under water. Max harcoded distance is 1000m.</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lineIntersects''' [begPos, endPos, objIgnore1, objIgnore2] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>[begPos, endPos, objIgnore1, objIgnore2]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> begPos: [[PositionASL]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> endPos: [[PositionASL]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> objIgnore1: (optional) [[Object]] - object to ignore. When testing intersection from an object/unit/vehicle, pass that object here to prevent intersection inside of the object.</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> objIgnore2: (optional) [[Object]] - another object to ignore. When testing intersection of a line between two objects, pass the second object here to prevent intersection inside of it being reported</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - true if intersection </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lineIntersects]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[eyePos]] [[player]], [[aimPos]] chopper, [[player]], chopper]</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[lineIntersectsSurfaces]], [[intersect]], [[terrainIntersect]], [[terrainIntersectASL]], [[terrainIntersectAtASL]], [[lineIntersectsWith]], [[lineIntersectsObjs]], [[cursorObject]], [[cursorTarget]], [[checkVisibility]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
